Vmaps

Spatial intelligence

About

VMaps Company, is a rapidly developing prospective GIS organization with extensive expertise that includes the following:

  • Vectorising raster maps with various degrees of detail and accuracy
  • Converting print and digital maps to a vector format
  • Managing field teams whom obtain the necessary data for creating vector maps
  • Designing and Maintaining Infographics
  • Designing Thematic maps
  • GIS Data Analysis

In addition, we are also looking forward to various other projects employing GIS Technology. We are open to other projects.

Layers prepared
GIS data are created
Maps are in use

What you achive with us?
  • Using our professional skills and free software, we can provide any output materials and formats to meet the desire and needs of our customers.
  • GIS is a system of hardware and software used for storage, retrieval, mapping, and analysis of geographic data.
  • Computer Aided Design is the use of a wide range of computer based tools that assist engineers, achitects and other design professionals in their design activities.
  • Field survey, existing drawings, old paper maps
  • GIS data can be saved in the format, that suits your needs best: KML/KMZ, SHP, TAB/MIF, GeoJSON, CSV, TIFF, ECW etc.
Benefits for our clients
Leveraging of Spatial benefits
Time and process optimization: Minimized re-works
Reduced cost
Effectiveness and accuracy of the planning processes
